title: Did Pelosi Say It’s ‘Dangerous’ to Let Voters Decide Trump’s Fate in 2020?
subtitle: The U.S. president took a misleading paraphrase by a Fox News host and claimed it was a direct quote.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi said it's dangerous to let voters decide President Donald Trump's fate in the 2020 election.
